# `src` API reference

This page gives an overview of all public `src` objects, functions and methods. All
classes and functions exposed in `src.*` namespace are public.

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 2
./data_cleaning.md
./data_ingest.md
./data_validation.md
./data_processing.md
./data_visualisations.md
./utils.md
./src.md
```
